titles.title: Round the Lord in Glory Seated

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Round the Lord in glory seated, cherubim and seraphim filled his temple, and repeated each to each th'alternate hymn: "Lord, Thy glory fills the heaven, earth is with its fullness stored; unto Thee be glory given, Holy, holy, holy, Lord."

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Heav'n is still with glory ringing; earth takes up the angels' cry, "Holy, holy, holy," singing, "Lord of hosts, the Lord Most High!" "Lord, Thy glory fills the heaven, earth is with its fullness stored; unto Thee be glory given, Holy, holy, holy, Lord."

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: With His seraph-train before Him, With His holy Church below, thus conspire we to adore Him, bid we thus our anthem flow: "Lord, Thy glory fills the heaven, earth is with its fullness stored; unto Thee be glory given, Holy, holy, holy, Lord."

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thus Thy glorious name confessing, with Thine angel hosts we cry, "Holy, holy, holy," blessing Thee, the Lord of Hosts Most High. "Lord, Thy glory fills the heaven, earth is with its fullness stored; unto Thee be glory given, Holy, holy, holy, Lord."
